unnormalised: Ekadantle title aslolea vyaktik sambodhit korpacho yogya marg kitem?
normalised: Ekavyaktik anek padvyon aslear tankam koxe sambodhan korchem?

unnormalised: Ekadantle title dhorlelea vyaktink sambodhit korpak ek gunthgunthit paddhachi goroz asta, khas korun vidhimanddalachea vatavaran. Samanyponnan, samporkachea sandarbhar adharit soglleant unch rankichem va soglleant relevant title vapropachi sall dili veta. Udaharonnak, konnakuy "Dr." ani "Prof." donuy title aslear, tumi ek shaikshanik vatavaran "Prof." vapruyet, tanchea profesoral bhumikecher uzvadd dalkon. Tori astana, vaidyakiye sallahant, "Dr." adhik yogya rup zatlem. Kitem kortalem tem nischit naslear, "Prof." va "Dr." sarkhem soglleant unch shaikshanik title vaprapak, te prayash ek surakshit ani sammanajanak vikalp zata.
normalised: Anek padvyon aslolea vyaktink sambodhan kortana ek vichitr margachi goroz asta, khas korun formal sthitint. Samanyatah, interactionache contextacher adharit, uchatam ani sarkarya padvi vaparop chi salvar divpachi asta. Udharonnak, konn "Doctor" ani "Professor" donuy aslear, tumi academic vatavornant "Professor" vapru yeta, tanchi professorial bhumika ujvoddan hadun. Pun, ek medical consultationant "Doctor" chodd sarkarya ashtat. Jemva khot nashta, tenva uchatam academic padvi, zoxe "Professor" vo "Doctor" vaprun ek surakshit ani adarachi salvar asta.

unnormalised: Vyavsayik vatavaran, sanghattanik kram varit korpachem mahatvachem asta. Udaharonnak, konnui "CEO" ani "Director" title dhorunk pavlear, tanka "CEO" mhonn sambodhit korun tanchea executive leadership positionak darshak asta. Tech porim, "Hon'ble" va "Shri" sarkhi sorkari post dhorlelea vyaktink sarkech rupant adhikrut sandesant sambodhit korunk zai. Sodeache bhumikecher ani tanchea zimmedariyancher pratibimbit kortat te titlek sadanch pahilya panvddear dovrat.
normalised: Professional vatavornant, sangathnacho hierarchy somzop gorjechem asta. Udharonnak, konn "C-E-O" asun "Director" padvi dharon karta zalear, tankam "C-E-O" mhonn sambodhan dilear tanchi executive leadership sthan dakhoita. Toxench, "Honorable" vo "Shri" zoxe sarkar padvi dharon kortat, tankam official communicationsant tashi salvar divonk zai. Tankam jem vatavorn ditat tantun tanchi sadhyachi bhumika ani jababdari dakhounchea padvyonk sodanch mahatv divonk zai.

unnormalised: Utrar, dubavo aslear, aplea favorte rupant sambodhit korpak vyaktik sodhech vicharop soglleant sammanajanak marg asta. Tumi husharikayen vicharunk sakta, "Tumi koxen sambodhit korpak utam?" va "Hanv tumkam ullekhitana hanv kitem title vaprunk zai?". Hem tumi tankam soglleant olkhiche title vapurtat ani khannyech ukoddllo va apradh utponn korpak tras dita. Gupitcho bhag mhonnllear dusreanchea pasandak samman ani vichar darshak korpachem.
normalised: Nimanne, jemva khot asta tenva, vyaktik tanchi salvar dileat ti vicharpak sarkarya marg asta. Tumi vinay purvak vicharu yeta, "Tumkam koxe sambodhan korpak tumchi psand ashi?" vo "Tumkam ullekh kortana kitem padvi vapravchi?". Hem tumi te padvi vaparta jemni tanchea sovem chodd vollokh dista ani konnachei galtsamzenn vo dukhpanna vinnem. Ugdavpak zai, etiquette mhonnje dusreanche psandanche adar ani vichar dakhoita.
